about_the_game:
You find yourself trapped in the confines of Dualbooted's enigmatic laboratory, a labyrinthine complex brimming with peril and mystery. As a test subject endowed with regenerating health and the extraordinary ability to manipulate time, your ultimate goal remains constant: guide a peculiar cube to a distant pressure plate, all while contending with the relentless guardians of the facility.

The game unfolds within a single expansive chamber, meticulously designed to offer endless permutations and challenges. At the far end of the chamber lies the elusive pressure plate, a tantalizing beacon of progress beckoning you forward. However, reaching it is no simple task, as the chamber is patrolled by a legion of robotic sentinels programmed to thwart your every move.

Players must utilize a combination of strategy, cunning, and skill to outmaneuver their mechanical adversaries. The option to engage in direct combat exists, requiring precise timing and utilization of your time-slowing abilities to gain the upper hand. Alternatively, employing stealth and evasion allows you to slip past them undetected.

Each encounter with the robots presents a unique challenge, requiring adaptability and ingenuity to overcome.

"Timeless" offers a deeply immersive experience within a confined space, challenging players to explore the depths of their abilities. Will you persevere against overwhelming odds and secure a great score? The answer lies within the chamber, waiting to be discovered.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14 Sonoma
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400H @ 2.70GHz 2.69 GHz
  • Memory: 196 MB RAM

name: Timeless

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 22621.1848
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400H @ 2.70GHz 2.69 GHz
  • Memory: 196 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce drivers version 536.23
  • Storage: 196 MB available space

short_description: A exciting strategy action game wherein the player needs to outmaneuver mechanical adversaries in order to guide a cube to an awaiting pressure plate. Each time the player does so, it highens its score. The goal of the game is to get as high a score as possible.
